trans-unit.source: Defines the abstract base class for binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义绑定元素用于创建对等解析程序对象的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the abstract base class for all binding elements used to create peer resolver objects.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义用于创建对等解析程序对象的所有绑定元素的抽象的基类。

trans-unit.source: For specific implementations of this class, please see the documentation for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类的特定实现，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerCustomResolverBindingElement></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement>文档

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新默认实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> class by duplicating the provided <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref>通过复制所提供的类<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref> object to copy when creating this class instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement"></xref>要复制时创建此类实例的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a peer resolver object with the settings defined on this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 对此绑定元素定义的设置创建一个对等解析程序对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref> object that is used to perform peer name to address resolution.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolver"></xref>用于执行名称到地址解析对等的对象。

trans-unit.source: The settings on the peer resolver must be defined on the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 必须对该绑定元素定义对等解析程序上的设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the referral policy for peer resolvers created with binding elements created by implementations of this class.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置的引用策略，对等解析程序是用创建此类的实现的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the referral policy for peer resolvers created with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerReferralPolicy"></xref>枚举值，指定用此绑定元素创建的对等解析程序的引用策略。
